about_the_game:
In the demo, you'll get to experience the first two days out of five! The demo covers the common route.

--

In the small island country of Liliana, lays Clarke, an artist who just so happens to be a marble. They're having some trouble, you see. They're facing the worst thing that can happen to a creative: artist's block. Following the footsteps of their favorite artists, they're out on the town to find a muse! That's where you come in! It's your job to guide Clarke to their next muse and maybe even help them find love along the way. Will you make Clarke's next piece the best artwork Liliana has ever seen, or will they continue to be plagued with artist's block?

Inspired by the YouTube channel, Jelle's Marble Runs, and the visual novel Hatoful Boyfriend, A Marble's Muse is a romantic comedy visual novel where you can romance marbles!

Features

  • 5 romance interests, all with their own storyline and personality!

  • Open Dyslexic font option

  • A ninja

  • The mafia

  • A gigantic event where marbles participate in numerous sports, such as horse racing and ribbon dancing aka the Marble Palooza

name: A Marble's Muse Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Will you be able to find love and create art in Liliana, a colorful land full of marbles?
